items.title: A beginners guide to window cleaning business
items.headline: Learn what it takes to start your own window cleaning business. How to clean windows and how to start your own business
objectives_summary: This course covers the fundamentals of window cleaning business, which means that the students will learn how to clean the windows (the traditional way), how to price the houses, what equipment they need in order to start and so on. We will also go into the marketing your services.
We will also go into most common questions asked by new window cleaners
Course will touch on additional services such as cleaning the gutters and conservatories
